content:
Pronouns 101 workshops are this week! (*Both workshops will have the same content - join what fits your schedule!)

Tuesday, September 21, 10:30 AM - 12:00 PM MDT
OR
Wednesday, September 22, 2:30 - 4:00 PM MDT

Please see the Sundog announcement for the link: https://sundog.ucar.edu/Interact/Pages/Content/Document.aspx?id=3469
Note: if you open the event in the links in the sundog post, and then click the "Join Zoom Meeting" link beforehand, it will prompt you to "register".
The session yesterday was very good. Please consider attending today if you are able.
